metadata.title: CVE-2020-22284 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the zepif_linkoutput() function of FreeSoftware Foundation lwIP git head version and version 2.1.2 allowsattackers to access sensitive information via a crafted 6LoWPAN packet.

criterions.comment: lwip package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
